mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house (h_seller_id, h_name, h_describe, h_address, h_detail_address, h_price, h_longitude, h_latitude, h_square, h_checked) VALUES (#{hSellerId}, #{hName}, #{hDescribe}, #{hAddress}, #{hDetailAddress}, #{hPrice}, #{hLongitude}, #{hLatitude}, #{hSquare}, #{hChecked})
mapper.update: UPDATE house SET h_name = #{hName}, h_describe = #{hDescribe}, h_address = #{hAddress}, h_detail_address = #{hDetailAddress}, h_price = #{hPrice}, h_longitude = #{hLongitude}, h_latitude = #{hLatitude}, h_square = #{hSquare}, h_checked = #{hChecked} WHERE h_id = #{hId}
